# Objectives

- Create a DataCamp account.
- Join the ECO602/634 DataCamp course.


# Introduction

One of the resources we'll use to learn R is <a href="https://datacamp.com">DataCamp</a>.

DataCamp has lots of good resources for learning about R.  We'll complement original course material with their R training.


# Instructions

This assignment is pretty simple!

1. Navigate to <a href="https://DataCamp.com">DataCamp</a>.
2. Create a free account.
3. Follow the DataCamp course invite link (in the course Moodle).
